title: LReal numbers comparison with variable precision
name: LGF_CompareLRealByPrecision
description: This function checks floating point numbers for equality, by using an approximation formula and a given precision.

input.name: valueA
input.description: First LREAL number to be compared.

input.name: valueB
input.description: Second LREAL number to be compared.

input.name: precision
input.description: Accuracy with which the two values are compared.

return_value.description: FALSE: not equal, TRUE: approximately the same
